---
name: Report writing Issue
about: Here are the steps for checking that something you've written in the report
  is ready for a review
title: Write X in the report
labels: Report
assignees: ''

---

I, [Name] hereby solemnly swear that i have done the following in the pursuit of my academic excellence:

- [ ] Used appropriate sources if needed
- [ ] Run it through Grammarly or some LLM to check for incoherent text.
- [ ] Only inserted figures/images which get referenced.
